title: Structural parameters are superior to eigenvector centrality in detecting progressive supranuclear palsy with machine learning & multimodal MRI
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Franziska Albrecht, Karsten Mueller, Tommaso Ballarini, Klaus Fassbender, Jens Wiltfang, Adrian Danek, Janine Diehl-Schmid, Holger Jahn, Jan Kassubek, Johannes Kornhuber, Bernhard Landwehrmeyer, Martin Lauer, Johannes Prudlo, Anja Schneider, Albert C. Ludolph, Klaus Fliesbach, Sarah Anderl-Straub, Katharina Brüggen, Marie Fischer, Hans Förstl
